name: D.H.Witсh
description:
The little witch was caught by evil people, now her fate is in the hands of the player, will our heroine be able to escape and fly away on her broom to calm edges.



D.H.Witch - 2d shooter about the difficult fate of the little witch, avoid obstacles, beware of traps and dodge flying crows and copters flying by.



Game features:
- Beautiful Pixel-Art
- Responsive management
- Little Witch ^ _ ^
